-e ---

MURGU 𒈱𒋞 ⇔ मार्ग mārga (road) march

𒈱 MUR7 ≈ 𓈗 mar in 𒈱𒁀;𒈱𒁀;𒁀𒈱;𒁀𒈱 murguba "shell of a marine creature" ⇔ munakoor

march

𓅓 𓈙 𓂝 𓏏 𓈎 𓍜 | shoulder (blade) | (σ > ⲟ) ⲙⲟⲩⲧ moⲩt •murdj 𒈱 murgu₂ "shoulder"

MA.EGIR 𒈱 길 gil ڕێگە rêge орук oruk < سڑک saṛak street

𒈱 murgu mark draw, design ⇔ merge mal

track δρόμος drómos droga доро́га doróha 도로 doro 道路 どうろ dōro road راه râh rue ル ru lu!

rodh raster रास्ता rāstā

𓌻 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏤 | riverbank | •māróad 𒈝 water-road #mālaku 𓅓 𓍿 𓃒 𒄯𒊏 mur-raᵈ
𓌻 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏤 | riverbank | •māróad 𒈱 𒋞 MURGU मार्ग mārga 𓅓 𓂝 𓍿 𓇱 road
